modification.name: Mods Out of Date Reminder
modification.description: This mod is for reminding people after a new patch comes out to update and re-apply their mods. New patchs without a new apply can brake the interface or crash the game. This is recommended to stay enabled.
modification.author: Shirkit (from Notausgang)

editfile.name: ui/fe2/social_groups.package
editfile.insert: <!-- Mods-out-of-Date Patch Notice --> <trigger name="modsood_check" /> <template name="modsood_body"> <panel y="0.5h" width="100%" float="bottom" color="invisible" grow="1"> <label fity="1" fitypadding="0.8h" width="-1.6h" align="center" font="dyn_10" color="white" shadow="1" noclick="1" wrap="1" content="You have not applied your mods since the last patch. You should re-apply your mods before playing." /> <panel width="-1.6h" align="center" height="3.2h" color="invisible" noclick="1"> <instance name="button2" width="10.0h" height="2.4h" align="left" valign="top" label="/playanyway" onclick="Call('modsood_panel', 'FadeOut(250);');" /> <instance name="button2" width="16.0h" height="2.4h" align="right" valign="top" label="main_button_quit" onclick="Quit();" /> </panel> </panel> </template> <panel name="modsood_panel" watch="modsood_check" ontrigger="If(!StringEmpty(UpdateLocalVersion) and !StringEquals(UpdateLocalVersion, '%%CURRENT VERSION%%'), Split(BringToFront(), FadeIn(250)));" visible="0" blockinput="true" color="0 0 0 .7"> <instance name="alert_box_growable" width="32.0h" align="center" label="Outdated Mods" show_close="true" closebtn_click="Call('modsood_panel', 'FadeOut(250);');" body="modsood_body" /> </panel>
